channel.title: "Referral Rewards" -- Get FREE keys and even physical rewards
channel.description: Can't back and/or want to earn **more**? **2/2/2017 Update: Now adding an extra Discord title, "Advocate" for those that refer 5+!** 1) Ping/DM **@i42-Xblade** in [Discord (https://discord.gg/rFAXXQB)](https://discord.gg/rFAXXQB) 2) I'll generate you a unique link that tracks people who pledge. 3) Share it on your FB, forums, youtube/blog comments, reddit, FB groups, Steam groups, Discord Groups, etc ;D * Don't refer yourself -__- I'll know. * Yes, the rewards stack if you are also a backer! * Only valid 1/27/2016+ backers -- this is a _reach out to new people_ campaign. * Rewards are distributed upon a successful Kickstarter when other KS rewards are to be distributed. * No sneaky stuff. I'll know. Pinned during the Kickstarter.

item.title: "Referral Rewards" -- Get FREE keys and even physical rewards
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Can’t back and/or want to earn more?

2/2/2017 Update: Now adding an extra Discord title, “Advocate” for those that refer 5+!

  1. Ping/DM @i42-Xblade in Discord (https://discord.gg/rFAXXQB)

  2. I’ll generate you a unique link that tracks people who pledge.

  3. Share it on your FB, forums, youtube/blog comments, reddit, FB groups, Steam groups, Discord Groups, etc ;D

  • Don’t refer yourself -__- I’ll know.
  • Yes, the rewards stack if you are also a backer!
  • Only valid 1/27/2016+ backers – this is a reach out to new people campaign.
  • Rewards are distributed upon a successful Kickstarter when other KS rewards are to be distributed.
  • No sneaky stuff. I’ll know.

Pinned during the Kickstarter.

Read full topic
item.source: "Referral Rewards" -- Get FREE keys and even physical rewards
